cs.HC, cs.GR, cs.CL, cs.CYBER, cs.LG 

The paper discusses the integration of multiple sensory media in virtual reality (VR) to improve virtual realism and knowledge transfer. This topic falls under the category of human-computer interaction (cs.HC) as it explores how humans interact with technology. The paper also mentions the development of a VR training platform, which could fall under the category of graphics (cs.GR) or cybernetics (cs.CYBER). Additionally, the paper discusses the potential for improved learning outcomes, which could involve natural language processing (cs.CL) or machine learning (cs.LG) techniques.
